import React, {useEffect, useState} from "react"; import HeaderAdmin from "./headerAdmin"; import "../Styles/ManagePost.css" import AccountService from "../../Auth/Service/service"; import moment from 'moment'; export default function BlockUsers(){ const[users, setUsers] = useState([]) const getValue = async()=>{ await AccountService.trashAccount() .then((res)=>{ setUsers(res.data.data) }) .catch((err)=>{ console.log(err) }) } useEffect(()=>{ getValue() },[]) const handleRestore = async (id) =>{ await AccountService.restoreAccount(id) } return( <>
